name: Domain of Blessing: Deepfire Construct I
description:
A once-magnificent design left abandoned to time. This desolate site, hidden deep within the mountain's heart, casts but a flickering shadow of its former grandiose creation.
Thorough exploration may reveal treasures that those who long to reach beyond the heavens can only dream of obtaining.
disorder: When a character's Plunging Attack hits an opponent, their CRIT DMG increases by 30%, and ATK increases by 20% for 15s.
